General.Name: Jilin Jlu Communication Design Institute Co Ltd
General.Description: Jilin Jlu Communication Design Institute Co., Ltd provides survey, design, and consulting services for communication engineering projects in China. The company offers data network, support network, mobile communication, microwave communication, wireless network optimization, optical fiber communication, communication power supply, communication line, communication pipeline, CATV, intelligent building system integration, broadband optical fiber access, smart city construction, etc. It serves clients in the communications, electricity, water conservancy, transportation, public security, banking, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Changchun Telecommunications Engineering Design Institute Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jilin Jlu Communication Design Institute Co., Ltd in May 2010. Jilin Jlu Communication Design Institute Co., Ltd was founded in 1985 and is based in Changchun, China.
